Tap_Type_and_Enter.name: Tap_Type_and_Enter
Tap_Type_and_Enter.description: Tap an input box at position (x, y), Type the "text", and then perform the Enter operation. Very useful for searching and sending messages!
Tap_Type_and_Enter.precondition: There is a text input box on the screen with no previously entered content.

Tap_Back_to_Main_List.name: Tap_Back_to_Main_List
Tap_Back_to_Main_List.description: Tap a back button at position (x, y) to return to the main movie list after viewing details of a specific movie.
Tap_Back_to_Main_List.precondition: The current screen is a movie details page, and the back button is visible at position (x, y).
